pkgmetadata.longdescription: LaternaMagica is a single-window image viewer application which is capable of switching to full-screen mode. LaternaMagica maintains its image list in a window and the user selects which image to display, making it easy to assemble a show from different source directories. LaternaMagica can recurse into directories when looking for images to add and construct the list. LaternaMagica is capable of exporting the complete list to a folder by operating resizing and file conversion
